name: mewtwonite-y
effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo Y.
short_effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo Y.

flavor_text.sun-moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Mewtwo hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Mewtwo hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. This stone will enable Mewtwo to Mega Evolve during battle.
